Since you are my brother and therefore do not have any immovable property in your name, I wish you to inherit some immovable property in my name, for your happiness, for your progress and for your good, and out of love for you, I have given you the following immovable property worth Rs. 5,43,000/- as per the schedule below, free of charge. Therefore, I have taken possession of the property with all rights (pulites) as per the schedule. Therefore, you shall pay all the Panchayat taxes, etc. from this amount and enjoy it freely and comfortably, with the rights of donation, sale and all rights, through your sons and grandsons. I hereby agree that I, my heirs, you, and your heirs, at my own expense, will settle all disputes, disputes, and disputes arising from this agreement, and that I will continue to enforce this agreement in accordance with this settlement document. I hereby declare that I have not mortgaged this property to anyone else, nor have I made any pledges, guarantees, purchase agreements, donations, or placed it under court seizure, nor have I made any other encumbrances, nor have I made any other claims, nor have I any other heirs or beneficiaries to this property except myself, nor have I ever made any use deed to this property to anyone, nor have I ever made any tax arrears on this property, and I hereby give you this settlement deed in your name, fully trusting you, and stating that I will be able to pay all such tax arrears. This is A.P. No. 9/77 Act.

Not an asset assigned by the Government.

Declaration -- Except for the buildings mentioned in Annexure-1A, there are no other fruit trees, buildings, mines, granites, valuable missionary etc.

items liable to stamp duty.

Kovaricham (Zodiacs,

Section 22-B Registration Act - 1908
Declaration: This declaration is to inform that in the context of preparing this document, I/We have taken all the necessary documents such as the property details in the document, land taluk 1b, copies of the attachments, link document, land/house tax receipt, details of the parties in the link document, addresses of the parties, photos of the parties, property details etc. and have examined all the aspects thoroughly and have entered them in this document. The deed has been prepared by recording.
No matter that should have been written or recorded has been omitted in this deed.
The deed has been prepared by physically examining the schedule property, taking measurements and taking measurements.
It is hereby confirmed that the said property has not been sold, mortgaged, etc. to anyone else in the past, except for the possession of the said property to you/yours, that the said property is an undisputed property, that there are no dues payable on the said property, and that in the future, if the property in the deed is found during the inspection of the said authorities (Registration and Stamps and Revenue Department), it is agreed to pay the depreciation stamp duty.
We have not violated the provisions of Section 22-B of the Registration Act, 1908. And for all other matters we are fully responsible.
These have nothing to do with the Shri Sub-Registrar or the Registrar of Deeds. This property is not the property of Shri Government, Endowment, Waqf Board and Assigned. If it is later discovered and investigated, we will be fully responsible for such decisions. We have read this document in full, and this is a declaration that we have given our full consent in writing.
Kovyiri Chandra Reddy,

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 447 of 2026, dated 29/Jan/2026, executed by Kovvuri Chandra Reddy, in favour of his Brother, Kovvuri Sur Reddy, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 72 Sq. Yds., located nearby House Number 1-48/1, comprised in survey number 72/2, situated in Velagaleru Village and Grama Panchayath, Penumantra Mandal, within the District of West Godavari, registered at sub-registrar office Mogalthuru(517), is bounded as follows: Schedule 1 - Boundaries as per the Deed North by: House Site Of Peruri Surya Suma South by: House Site Of Cement Surya Suma East by: House Site Of Kodavati Malleswari West by: House Site Of Koururi Seethalakshmi
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible. 2. It is to be noted that there is mismatch with the "South Boundary" House Site Of Cement Surya Suma between Deed and Ement Road in the EC, it is, therefore advisable for F.I. to obtain updated EC as per Deed.
